metadata.title: CVE-2024-26753 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: crypto:virtio/akcipher - Fix stack overflow on memcpy sizeof(structvirtio_crypto_akcipher_session_para) is less than sizeof(structvirtio_crypto_op_ctrl_req::u), copying more bytes from stack variable leadsstack overflow. Clang reports this issue by commands: make -j CC=clang-14mrproper >/dev/null 2>&1 make -j O=/tmp/crypto-build CC=clang-14allmodconfig >/dev/null 2>&1 make -j O=/tmp/crypto-build W=1 CC=clang-14drivers/crypto/virtio/ virtio_crypto_akcipher_algs.o

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26753` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
linux-image-hmac-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2103-aws-fips - 4.15.0-2103.109
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2103-aws-fips - 4.15.0-2103.109
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2082-azure-fips - 4.15.0-2082.88
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2082-azure-fips - 4.15.0-2082.88
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2066-gcp-fips - 4.15.0-2066.71
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2066-gcp-fips - 4.15.0-2066.71
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
